about_the_game:
Deep in Snow

Survival in a post-apocalyptic ice age with elements of building your own settlement. In a world where ruins of past civilization lie beneath two meters of snow, you must not only build but also defend yourself and your settlement.
Dig through the snow, find resources, and use preserved buildings and furniture to create your settlement. But be prepared for dangers: evolved beasts born in harsh conditions and feral locals will threaten your survival. You’ll also have the opportunity to trade with more intelligent individuals.
Every day is a struggle. Gathering water, building shelters, defending your territory, and exploring frozen cities are your main tasks. After an icy meteorite passed close to Earth, the planet became uninhabitable. In the Eastern European region of the 16th century, people couldn’t even imagine such a catastrophe. Rebuild civilization and revive humanity!

Features

Character customization

Create a unique character for your journey! Customize gender, facial features, and individual traits to make your hero entirely your own.
Choose from a variety of clothing and armor options to keep warm and protect yourself from enemies. Combine stats to balance warmth and the durability of your equipment. Every decision impacts survival in the harsh icy world, making your character truly unique.

World

Every playthrough is unique thanks to procedural generation of the world, buildings, and resources. You can adjust generation settings to create a comfortable experience tailored to your preferences.
As you clear snow and expand your territory, you’ll uncover many intriguing objects buried deep beneath the snow. The world is dynamic and ever-changing: seasonal shifts add realism, and weekly storms will test your preparation. Plan ahead to ensure you and your settlement can survive the harsh conditions of this icy world.

Enemies

Harsh weather and scarce resources are not the only challenges you’ll face.
Your main enemies will be local inhabitants who thawed long before you. Over time, they have created several generations of people with immunity to extreme cold. They build their settlements and can become either your foes or trading partners, depending on your actions.
The world is populated by evolved animals adapted to survive in extreme conditions. Saber-toothed bears, deer, boars, wolves, and other predators will not only threaten you in snowy tunnels but also provide food and resources essential for survival.
